interface.name: PrinterGraphics
interface.javadoc: The PrinterGraphics interface is implemented by{@link java.awt.Graphics} objects that are passed to{@link Printable} objects to render a page. It allows an application to find the {@link PrinterJob} object that is controlling the printing.
Returns the PrinterJob that is controlling the current rendering request. the PrinterJob controlling the current rendering request. java.awt.print.Printable
